√hā1 'leave'

present: [3.] jáhāti  jahati etc. V.+  jahītam  jahīta  jahītāt  jahīhi  jahihi  jahāhi  jahimas etc.  jahitam  ajahitām  jahyāt etc. AV.+   -- [1.] jahat  jahati etc. E.+  

perfect: jahau  jahús etc. V.+  jahā  jahe  

aorist: [1.] ahāt  ahāyi  heyāt   -- [3.] ajījahat   -- [4.] ahās (3s.)  ahāsma  hāsus etc.  áhāsi  áhāsthās etc.   -- [6.] hāsiṣam etc. V.+  

future: [1.] hāsyati etc. AV.+  hāsyate etc. B.+  jahiṣyati etc. E.+   -- [2.] hātā  

verbal: hīná V.+  hāta  hāna  jahitá V.+  hātum B.+  hitvā́ V.+  hitvī́  hitvā́ya  hītvā  -hā́ya B.+  -hī́yam  

secondary: passive: hīyáte etc. V.+  hī́yate etc.  hīyanti   -- intensive: jāhā-  jeyīya-   -- desiderative: jihāsati etc.   -- causative: hāpayati etc. E.+  hāpayate  jīhipas  

derivatives: -hā  -ha E.+  hāyaka E.  hāyin JB.  -hāyya B.  hāna B.+  -hāyas V.+  hātavya E.+  hāni U.S.+  -hi? C.  heya C.  -hāvarī MS.  hāpana C.  -hāpanīya C.  jihāsā C.  jihāsu C.  jáhaka B.  jáhāka B.  jahana C.  

Compare the next root. Two or three of the forms given above show the establishment of a secondary root-form jah.
